sourcesContent: import { Route, Router, RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { catchError } from 'rxjs'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { Username = ''; Pass = ''; isLogin = false; constructor(private sharedService: SharedService, private router: Router) {} async login(): Promise { this.sharedService .login(this.Username, this.Pass) .pipe( catchError((error) => { console.log('Thất bại'); throw error; }) ) .subscribe((response: any) => { console.log('Đăng nhập thành công'); this.isLogin = true; this.router.navigate(['/department']); this.router.navigate(['/employee']); }); } }
